title: ValuWare
description: ValuWare is a comprehensive solution for survey and valuation management, developed for ValuStrat Consulting FZCO.

details.description: ValuWare is a product of ValuStrat Consulting FZCO, the Middle East’s leading provider of Strategic Advisory, Valuation, and Asset Divestment services. The app facilitates location-based survey assignments, dynamic survey forms, offline access and synchronization, and a comprehensive workflow for survey creation, submission, approval/rejection, and client delivery.
features: Dynamic survey forms with various field types
Change survey location using maps, camera, and video
Different authorization levels for admin, managers, and surveyors
Workflow for creating, submitting, approving/rejecting, and sending surveys to clients
role_and_responsibility: Developed the iPad application, including database design and web service implementation.
Implemented offline access and synchronization features for seamless survey management.
Integrated various functionalities like maps, camera, and video for enhanced user experience.
Ensured different authorization levels for admin, managers, and surveyors for secure access.
Conducted extensive testing to ensure the app’s stability and performance across various devices.
Worked on bug fixing and improving application performance.
This project was a significant step in my career, allowing me to work on a comprehensive survey and valuation management solution for a leading consulting firm.
